segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, but she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies behind her back, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that wobbly stool, and it looks like it could tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for a cookie, her hand outstretched like she’s begging.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everything looks outside the window while chaos is unfolding inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring onto the floor, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is wide open, and the boy is grabbing as many as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the mess before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
